item.title: Peroviskite review
item.description:
### SC‘s Current Density-Voltage Characteristics Analysis >' A step by step approach to analyse SCs and indentify performance-limiting factors through the analysis of J-V curves' - Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) > $$PCE = Pout/Pin = Jsc · Voc · FF/ Pin$$ > Pin being the incident light power - Open-circuit Voltage (Voc) >'The voltage at which the net current through the cell is zero' - Short-circuit Current density (Jsc) >'Current Density at which the outer cell voltage is zero' - Fill Factor (FF) > $$FF = /frac{Jmpp·Vmpp}{Jsc·Voc}$$ >Jmpp and Vmpp denote the current density and voltagr at the maximum power point (MPP) respectively.
。

item.title: 从KU校队绝对主力，到CUHK校队试训85/100
